## Description {#details}

A bitvector that uses an IntervalMap to coalesce adjacent elements into intervals.

<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#adda8ae7ed8c5cb9a55ebed6dc502f829"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#adda8ae7ed8c5cb9a55ebed6dc502f829">set</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ThisT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.Intervals.begin(), End = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.Intervals.end();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">         It != End; ++It)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">      insert(It.start(), It.stop());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Set the bits at \\p Indices. Used for testing, primarily.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#afdb3d49db544a98dd7813a0f0570bb3e"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#afdb3d49db544a98dd7813a0f0570bb3e">set</a>(std::initializer&#95;list&lt;IndexT&gt; Indices) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IndexT Index : Indices)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a01f3632c0200ff6d2cd9e1c41fb28884">set</a>(Index);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Check whether the bit at \\p Index is set.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a4ea04096d3150fce8a81df0a6a128630"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a4ea04096d3150fce8a81df0a6a128630">test</a>(IndexT Index)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = Intervals.find(Index);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (It == Intervals.end())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(It.stop() &gt;= Index &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Interval must end after Index&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It.start() &lt;= Index;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Set the bit at \\p Index. Supports setting an already-set bit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#af020db0e9eae4b30ee1280fc8252c36b"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#af020db0e9eae4b30ee1280fc8252c36b">test&#95;and&#95;set</a>(IndexT Index) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/moduloschedule-cpp/#a106e32122c569cdb42ddf61ecbb0aad1">test</a>(Index))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a01f3632c0200ff6d2cd9e1c41fb28884">set</a>(Index);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Reset the bit at \\p Index. Supports resetting an already-unset bit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#af964ac5526dc479d05fa985a815c3bfd"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#af964ac5526dc479d05fa985a815c3bfd">reset</a>(IndexT Index) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = Intervals.find(Index);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (It == Intervals.end())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Split the interval containing Index into up to two parts: one from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#91;Start, Index-1&#93; and another from &#91;Index+1, Stop&#93;. If Index is equal to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// either Start or Stop, we create one new interval. If Index is equal to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// both Start and Stop, we simply erase the existing interval.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">    IndexT Start = It.start();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Index &lt; Start)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The index was not set.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">    IndexT Stop = It.stop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Index &lt;= Stop &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Wrong interval for index&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">    It.erase();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Start &lt; Index)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">      insert(Start, Index - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Index &lt; Stop)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">      insert(Index + 1, Stop);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Set union. If \\p RHS is guaranteed to not overlap with this, \\ref set may</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// be a faster alternative.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a282e4fe888bd7353949e898f2b082aec"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a282e4fe888bd7353949e898f2b082aec">operator|=</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ThisT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get the overlaps between the two interval maps.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;IntervalT, 8&gt;</a> Overlaps;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    getOverlaps(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>, Overlaps);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insert the non-overlapping parts of all the intervals from RHS.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.Intervals.begin(), End = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.Intervals.end();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">         It != End; ++It) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">      IndexT Start = It.start();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">      IndexT Stop = It.stop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;IntervalT, 8&gt;</a> NonOverlappingParts;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">      getNonOverlappingParts(Start, Stop, Overlaps, NonOverlappingParts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IntervalT AdditivePortion : NonOverlappingParts)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">        insert(AdditivePortion.first, AdditivePortion.second);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Set intersection.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a6937de9f9b565292e78314e2f2a9b643"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a6937de9f9b565292e78314e2f2a9b643">operator&amp;=</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ThisT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get the overlaps between the two interval maps (i.e. the intersection).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;IntervalT, 8&gt;</a> Overlaps;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">    getOverlaps(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>, Overlaps);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Rebuild the interval map, including only the overlaps.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a9e7737b1b195e7a4787a06762dc58ee5">clear</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IntervalT Overlap : Overlaps)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">      insert(Overlap.first, Overlap.second);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Reset all bits present in \\p Other.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a8281db2481e9e13747abecef69c26988"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a8281db2481e9e13747abecef69c26988">intersectWithComplement</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ThisT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;IntervalT, 8&gt;</a> Overlaps;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!getOverlaps(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>, Overlaps)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there is no overlap with Other, the intersection is empty.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Delete the overlapping intervals. Split up intervals that only partially</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// intersect an overlap.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IntervalT Overlap : Overlaps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">      IndexT OlapStart, OlapStop;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::tie(OlapStart, OlapStop) = Overlap;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = Intervals.find(OlapStart);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">      IndexT CurrStart = It.start();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">      IndexT CurrStop = It.stop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CurrStart &lt;= OlapStart &amp;&amp; OlapStop &lt;= CurrStop &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected some intersection!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Split the overlap interval into up to two parts: one from &#91;CurrStart,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// OlapStart-1&#93; and another from &#91;OlapStop+1, CurrStop&#93;. If OlapStart is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// equal to CurrStart, the first split interval is unnecessary. Ditto for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// when OlapStop is equal to CurrStop, we omit the second split interval.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">      It.erase();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurrStart &lt; OlapStart)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">        insert(CurrStart, OlapStart - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OlapStop &lt; CurrStop)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">        insert(OlapStop + 1, CurrStop);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a020f5cfb9cb8314a6d8e95f6ccc0dbbb"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a020f5cfb9cb8314a6d8e95f6ccc0dbbb">operator==</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ThisT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We cannot just use std::equal because it checks the dereferenced values</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of an iterator pair for equality, not the iterators themselves. In our</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// case that results in comparison of the (unused) IntervalMap values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ItL = Intervals.begin();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ItR = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.Intervals.begin();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ItL != Intervals.end() &amp;&amp; ItR != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.Intervals.end() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">           ItL.start() == ItR.start() &amp;&amp; ItL.stop() == ItR.stop()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++ItL;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++ItR;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ItL == Intervals.end() &amp;&amp; ItR == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.Intervals.end();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a5a185f76216967c1357df02a1ce78ad9"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a5a185f76216967c1357df02a1ce78ad9">iterator&#95;category</a> = std::forward&#95;iterator&#95;tag;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a3d219e5e3a04d282a37b019611da260b"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a3d219e5e3a04d282a37b019611da260b">value&#95;type</a> = IndexT;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#ac4da1e9b19d580f8fa129a632c38b92b"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#ac4da1e9b19d580f8fa129a632c38b92b">difference&#95;type</a> = std::ptrdiff&#95;t;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a42faf416f35f1d71e930d345a9907187"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a42faf416f35f1d71e930d345a9907187">pointer</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a3d219e5e3a04d282a37b019611da260b">value&#95;type</a> &#42;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a20599333ca901476cc096cb8970de09d"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a20599333ca901476cc096cb8970de09d">reference</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a3d219e5e3a04d282a37b019611da260b">value&#95;type</a> &amp;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For performance reasons, make the offset at the end different than the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// one used in \\ref begin, to optimize the common &#96;It == end()&#96; pattern.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> kIteratorAtTheEndOffset = ~0u;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">    UnderlyingIterator MapIterator;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OffsetIntoMapIterator = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Querying the start/stop of an IntervalMap iterator can be very expensive.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Cache these values for performance reasons.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">    IndexT CachedStart = IndexT();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">    IndexT CachedStop = IndexT();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> setToEnd() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">      OffsetIntoMapIterator = kIteratorAtTheEndOffset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">      CachedStart = IndexT();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">      CachedStop = IndexT();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// MapIterator has just changed, reset the cached state to point to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// start of the new underlying iterator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> resetCache() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MapIterator.valid()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">        OffsetIntoMapIterator = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">        CachedStart = MapIterator.start();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">        CachedStop = MapIterator.stop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">        setToEnd();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Advance the iterator to \\p Index, if it is contained within the current</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// interval. The public-facing method which supports advancing past the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// current interval is \\ref advanceToLowerBound.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> advanceTo(IndexT Index) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Index &lt;= CachedStop &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Cannot advance to OOB index&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Index &lt; CachedStart)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We&#39;re already past this index.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal">      OffsetIntoMapIterator = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a> - CachedStart;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a1faec3113d3b640c7167d65fb02c7d7d">const&#95;iterator</a>(UnderlyingIterator MapIt) : MapIterator(MapIt) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">      resetCache();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a1faec3113d3b640c7167d65fb02c7d7d"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a1faec3113d3b640c7167d65fb02c7d7d">const&#95;iterator</a>() &#123; setToEnd(); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#aa92fe842eec6c41aee09b16fccf8b21e"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#aa92fe842eec6c41aee09b16fccf8b21e">operator==</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> const&#95;iterator &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do /not/ compare MapIterator for equality, as this is very expensive.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The cached start/stop values make that check unnecessary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::tie(OffsetIntoMapIterator, CachedStart, CachedStop) ==</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="normal">             std::tie(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.OffsetIntoMapIterator, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.CachedStart,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal">                      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.CachedStop);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a7a5345a1142be7569dda0cebd0b0ea30"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a7a5345a1142be7569dda0cebd0b0ea30">operator!=</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> const&#95;iterator &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#aa92fe842eec6c41aee09b16fccf8b21e">operator==</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a054c94fba5be94119c7da823f6b73e72"><Highlight kind="normal">    IndexT <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a054c94fba5be94119c7da823f6b73e72">operator&#42;</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CachedStart + OffsetIntoMapIterator; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#aef3df4bb10fa6a61cad599f1ba4a93ef"><Highlight kind="normal">    const&#95;iterator &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#aef3df4bb10fa6a61cad599f1ba4a93ef">operator++</a>() &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Pre-increment (++It).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CachedStart + OffsetIntoMapIterator &lt; CachedStop) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Keep going within the current interval.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal">        ++OffsetIntoMapIterator;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We reached the end of the current interval: advance.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal">        ++MapIterator;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">        resetCache();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a49d548fe37864d209610df9cf181e5a7"><Highlight kind="normal">    const&#95;iterator <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#a49d548fe37864d209610df9cf181e5a7">operator++</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Post-increment (It++).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal">      const&#95;iterator tmp = &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#aef3df4bb10fa6a61cad599f1ba4a93ef">operator++</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> tmp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Advance the iterator to the first set bit AT, OR AFTER, \\p Index. If</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// no such set bit exists, advance to end(). This is like std::lower&#95;bound.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// This is useful if \\p Index is close to the current iterator position.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// However, unlike \\ref find(), this has worst-case O(n) performance.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#ab7ef8845c21d2c77b26099dc75a66ff5"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/const-iterator/#ab7ef8845c21d2c77b26099dc75a66ff5">advanceToLowerBound</a>(IndexT Index) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OffsetIntoMapIterator == kIteratorAtTheEndOffset)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Advance to the first interval containing (or past) Index, or to end().</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Index &gt; CachedStop) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">        ++MapIterator;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">        resetCache();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OffsetIntoMapIterator == kIteratorAtTheEndOffset)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">      advanceTo(Index);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a5af09d4680742bfa69b96288ae4d8811"><Highlight kind="normal">  const&#95;iterator <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a5af09d4680742bfa69b96288ae4d8811">begin</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> const&#95;iterator(Intervals.begin()); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a4094e1a4b11c655a8208dd9d7b306c43"><Highlight kind="normal">  const&#95;iterator <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a4094e1a4b11c655a8208dd9d7b306c43">end</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> const&#95;iterator(); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return an iterator pointing to the first set bit AT, OR AFTER, \\p Index.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If no such set bit exists, return end(). This is like std::lower&#95;bound.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This has worst-case logarithmic performance (roughly O(log(gaps between</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// contiguous ranges))).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a84519c831af8bdd490359710a57bea17"><Highlight kind="normal">  const&#95;iterator <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a84519c831af8bdd490359710a57bea17">find</a>(IndexT Index)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UnderlyingIt = Intervals.find(Index);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UnderlyingIt == Intervals.end())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a4094e1a4b11c655a8208dd9d7b306c43">end</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = const&#95;iterator(UnderlyingIt);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">    It.advanceTo(Index);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return a range iterator which iterates over all of the set bits in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// half-open range &#91;Start, End).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a2030e16dd7e797641827fafc2aa611fd"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iterator-range">iterator&#95;range&lt;const&#95;iterator&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a2030e16dd7e797641827fafc2aa611fd">half&#95;open&#95;range</a>(IndexT Start,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                 IndexT End)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Start &lt; End &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Not a valid range&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StartIt = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a84519c831af8bdd490359710a57bea17">find</a>(Start);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StartIt == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a4094e1a4b11c655a8208dd9d7b306c43">end</a>() || &#42;StartIt &gt;= End)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a4094e1a4b11c655a8208dd9d7b306c43">end</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a4094e1a4b11c655a8208dd9d7b306c43">end</a>()&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EndIt = StartIt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">    EndIt.advanceToLowerBound(End);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;StartIt, EndIt&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a8dcd2f2bbe443f454f514d7a663fd8cb"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a8dcd2f2bbe443f454f514d7a663fd8cb">print</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">    OS &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#123;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> It = Intervals.begin(), End = Intervals.end(); It != End;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">         ++It) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">      OS &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#91;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; It.start();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (It.start() != It.stop())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">        OS &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;, &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; It.stop();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">      OS &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#93;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">    OS &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#125;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Record the overlaps between \\p this and \\p Other in \\p Overlaps. Return</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// true if there is any overlap.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> getOverlaps(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ThisT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal">                   SmallVectorImpl&lt;IntervalT&gt; &amp;Overlaps)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IntervalMapOverlaps&lt;MapT, MapT&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>(Intervals, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.Intervals);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="normal">         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.valid(); ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="normal">      Overlaps.emplace&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.start(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.stop());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a864e071375fea140a5441a243372ff81">llvm::is&#95;sorted</a>(Overlaps,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal">                           &#91;&#93;(IntervalT <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>, IntervalT <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="normal">                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>.second &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="normal">                           &#125;) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Overlaps must be sorted&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> !Overlaps.empty();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Given the set of overlaps between this and some other bitvector, and an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// interval &#91;Start, Stop&#93; from that bitvector, determine the portions of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// interval which do not overlap with this.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> getNonOverlappingParts(IndexT Start, IndexT Stop,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal">                              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SmallVectorImpl&lt;IntervalT&gt; &amp;Overlaps,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal">                              SmallVectorImpl&lt;IntervalT&gt; &amp;NonOverlappingParts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">    IndexT NextUncoveredBit = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IntervalT Overlap : Overlaps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal">      IndexT OlapStart, OlapStop;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::tie(OlapStart, OlapStop) = Overlap;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#91;Start;Stop&#93; and &#91;OlapStart;OlapStop&#93; overlap iff OlapStart &lt;= Stop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and Start &lt;= OlapStop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DoesOverlap = OlapStart &lt;= Stop &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a> &lt;= OlapStop;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!DoesOverlap)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Cover the range &#91;NextUncoveredBit, OlapStart). This puts the start of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the next uncovered range at OlapStop+1.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NextUncoveredBit &lt; OlapStart)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">        NonOverlappingParts.emplace&#95;back(NextUncoveredBit, OlapStart - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal">      NextUncoveredBit = OlapStop + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NextUncoveredBit &gt; Stop)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NextUncoveredBit &lt;= Stop)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">      NonOverlappingParts.emplace&#95;back(NextUncoveredBit, Stop);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coalescingbitvector/#a56416744b3c83246a55d0890507b0654">Allocator</a> &#42;Alloc;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">  MapT Intervals;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
